content.en: Algorithm performance: Researchers have been investigating the performance of various algorithms in improving the classification and feature selection of hyperspectral images. One algorithm that has been widely studied is the Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) algorithm, which has shown promising results in enhancing the accuracy of classification and band selection. Other algorithms such as the Improved Firefly algorithm, Modified Ant Lion Optimizer, and Krill Herd algorithm have also been explored for their effectiveness in hyperspectral image analysis. These studies aim to develop more efficient and accurate methods for analyzing and interpreting hyperspectral data.
content.da: Algoritmeydelse: Forskere har undersøgt ydeevnen af forskellige algoritmer i forbedringen af klassificering og egenskabsudvælgelse af hyperspektrale billeder. En algoritme, der er blevet vidt studeret, er Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) algoritmen, som har vist lovende resultater i forbedringen af nøjagtigheden af klassificering og båndudvælgelse. Andre algoritmer som Improved Firefly algoritmen, Modified Ant Lion Optimizer og Krill Herd algoritmen er også blevet udforsket for deres effektivitet i hyperspektral billedanalyse. Disse studier har til formål at udvikle mere effektive og nøjagtige metoder til at analysere og fortolke hyperspektrale data.
